charges.charge_description: 18:2318(a) and (c)(3) COUNTERFEIT LABELS FOR COPYRIGHTED MOTION PICTURE AND AUDIO VISUAL WORK (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant sentenced to 4 months, 24 days, with credit for time served; supervised release 24 months; deft shall cooperate with immigration and naturalization service; special assessment of $100.00; Upon motion of the Government, the video tapes seized by the FBI be forfeited and destoyed pursuant to the Conterfeif Label Statute. (1)
